backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access-controlled user profiles and publisher management, including CRUD-style operations and role-based authorization for users and admins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting build/deployment retry behavior and error-capture workflows, mapping features to files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summary map describing the purpose of all major frontend files, components, hooks, pages, and configuration used in the application.
frontend/.env: Frontend environment configuration defining the Internet Identity provider URL for Vite-based builds.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme design tokens using the OKLCH color system and base layout styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Vite React app that mounts the root element and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application and routing setup using TanStack Router, handling authentication state, error handling, and defining all protected routes.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary that catches runtime exceptions, logs them, and renders a user-friendly fallback UI with error details and reload support.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Authenticated application shell that composes the sidebar, header, routed page outlet, and global toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Top navigation header displaying the app title, mobile menu toggle, and logout action that clears authentication and cached queries.
frontend/src/components/layout/Sidebar.t: Responsive, collapsible navigation sidebar listing all application routes with icons, active-state styling, and mobile behavior.
frontend/src/components/publishers/AddPu: Modal dialog component with a form to add a new publisher, managing local form state, validation, and submission via the useAddPublisher hook with success/error toasts.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and caches a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAddPublisher.ts: Mutation hook that maps UI privilege selections to backend format and calls the actorâ€™s addPublisher method, invalidating the publishers query on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication context and provider for Internet Identity, handling login/logout, identity persistence, and exposing login status flags to the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of data-fetching hooks, currently providing a useGetAllPublishers query that retrieves all publishers from the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, light/dark color palettes, custom Theiarco colors, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/ComingSoon.tsx: Simple presentational page showing a centered "Coming Soon" message with an icon and title for unfinished features.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Login page UI that triggers Internet Identity authentication and shows a loading state while logging in.
frontend/src/pages/Publishers.tsx: Publishers management page that lists publishers in a table, shows loading/empty states, and opens the AddPublisherModal to create new publishers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities to read URL parameters from query strings or hash-based routes, persist them in sessionStorage, and retrieve or clear them across navigation. Includes helpers to prioritize URL values, fall back to session storage, and safely manage sensitive parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining dark mode behavior, content paths, container settings, and an extended theme with custom OKLCH-based colors, radii, shadows, and animations. Integrates typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the overall project state, schema/versioning, and a structured list of existing features covering the Motoko backend, authorization, React/Tailwind frontend, authentication, UI layout, build/deploy templates, and initial Publishers functionality.
